page.title: 06 INDUSTRY
page.content: There are two factories in our area, only one: B.I.S.,still operates and the other: Ribdon Clay Works, is a refuse tip now. B.I.S.started in 196O and was producing sand by 1961.The reason it was built in Oakamoor was because of the presence of the right rock and it was near The Potteries. The sand is blasted out of the ground and is used in car windows,bullet proof glass,non drip paint,scouring powder,cosmetics, special flour and pottery. B.I.S.covers 5OO acres and employs 2OO people.Aidon Taylor was the founder of B.I.S. and a director.The sand at Oakamoor should last another 75 years.There are 4O conveyor belts and the longest is 39O meters,which is used to carry sand to the railway.They use 5OO kilos of gelignite mixed with diesel and fertiliser every blast.The explosions take place at 3.3Opm any working day.
